title: What is a curriculum day?
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Lily Steiner and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: A primary and postprimary teacher and parent/school councillor outline what is involved in a curriculum day. They discuss the benefits for both parents and teachers in evaluating school programs and ideas to facilitate the development of working relationships between both parties.
